opinion.attorneys:
Pinkney Scott, of Bessemer, for appellant.
Harwell G. Davis, Atty. Gen., for the State.
opinion.opinion_text:
Petition of George Treadaway for certiorari to the Court of Appeals to review and revise the judgment of said court affirming the appeal in George Treadaway v. State of Alabama,18 Ala. App. 409, 92 So. 529.
Writ denied.
ANDERSON, C. J., and McCLELLAN, SOMERVILLE, and THOMAS, JJ., concur.
